name: Gmail UI Part 1: Inbox
description:
This is Part 1 of a multi-part series. Part 1 includes the main Inbox. If you would like to check out individual emails and composing templates, you can find Part 2 here.


--


I realized as a youngster that I could learn a thing or topic better and more quickly by taking it apart to understand how it worked and then putting it back together.


As I continue to grow and improve my craft, I recreated the Gmail interface with all of the various states and styles that you would find in the real app. Everything is made with components and variants so you can easily swap out different states or screens.
